name: Slumber Party Panic
description: Finn and Jake must save Princess Bubblegum from an impending zombie attack.

name: Trouble in Lumpy Space
description: Finn and Jake venture into Lumpy Space to cure the Lumps from Jake's bite.

name: Prisoners of Love
description: Finn and Jake go on a mission to rescue kidnapped princesses from the Ice King.

name: Tree Trunks
description: Finn and Jake go on a quest with Tree Trunks to find the legendary Crystal Gem Apple.

name: The Enchiridion!
description: Finn and Jake go on a quest for The Enchiridion, the hero's handbook.

name: The Jiggler
description: Finn and Jake find a Jiggler and bring it back to its parents.

name: Ricardio the Heart Guy
description: Finn and Jake discover that the Ice King is the one who is kidnapping princesses.

name: Business Time
description: Finn and Jake try to help a businessman named Bufo.

name: My Two Favorite People
description: Jake tries to get Lady Rainicorn and Finn to become friends.

name: Memories of Boom Boom Mountain
description: Finn helps a tribe of homeless people.

name: Wizard
description: Finn and Jake are tasked with investigating reports of a haunting at Joshua and Margaret's old office.

name: Evicted!
description: Finn and Jake are evicted from their treehouse and set out to find a new home.

name: City of Thieves
description: Finn and Jake are caught in a web of thievery and are at the mercy of the city's criminals.

name: The Witch's Garden
description: Finn and Jake are sent to the Witch's Garden by a homeless

name: What is Life?
description: Finn builds a Never-Ending Pie-Throwing Robot for Jake, but the robot starts to become evil.

name: Ocean of Fear
description: Finn and Jake are terrified by the Oceans of the Land of Ooo.

name: When Wedding Bells Thaw
description: Finn and Jake are invited to the Ice King's wedding.

name: Dungeon
description: Finn and Jake are given one of the highest responsibilities: to guard the magical Dungeon.

name: The Duke
description: Finn and Jake are outsmarted by a rogue cookie.

name: Freak City
description: Finn and Jake are turned into criminals by the magic man.

name: Donny
description: Finn and Jake are called to help fight off a ghost that is causing trouble in a small village.

name: Henchman
description: Finn takes the place of Marceline's henchman, but finds it hard to obey her seemingly evil commands.
